alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 10:26PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ALLEN...SOUTHERN DE KALB...WEST CENTRAL DEFIANCE AND NORTHWESTERN PAULDING COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1026 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Auburn, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 323 and 332. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for northeastern Indiana...and northwestern and west central Ohio.
